title: Share test reports via email in Katalon Studio
description: After a test suite or test suite collection execution, you might   want to automatically send summary reports to your own email or   other stakeholders to notify them about the test result. This   document shows you how to set up your mail server and customize   email reports to automatically send out a summary report email   whenever a test execution finishes.

frontMatter.title: Share test reports via email in Katalon Studio
